scripts.InstallProduction: concurrently "npm run InstallCommon" "npm run InstallLogin" "npm run InstallLP" "npm run InstallInsights" "npm run InstallDante" "npm run InstallPD" "npm run InstallAdmin" "npm run InstallLP2"
scripts.InstallDev: concurrently "npm run InstallDevCommon" "npm run InstallDevLogin" "npm run InstallDevLP" "npm run InstallDevInsights"  "npm run InstallDevDante" "npm run InstallDevPD" "npm run InstallDevAdmin" "npm run InstallDevLP2"
scripts.dev: npm run sass && concurrently -kr "grunt dev" "npm run sentry"
scripts.dev_lp: npm run commonsass && npm run lpsass && concurrently -kr "grunt dev" "npm run commonsentry" "npm run lpsentry" "npm run insightssentry"
scripts.dev_login: npm run commonsass && npm run loginsass && concurrently -kr "grunt dev" "npm run commonsentry" "npm run loginsentry"
scripts.dev_pd: npm run commonsass && npm run pdsass && concurrently -kr "grunt dev" "npm run commonsentry" "npm run pdsentry"
scripts.dev_admin: npm run adminless && concurrently -kr "grunt dev_admin" "npm run adminsentry"
scripts.devb_admin: npm run adminless && concurrently -kr "grunt devb_admin" "npm run adminsentry"
scripts.devb: npm run sass && concurrently -kr "grunt devb" "npm run sentry"
scripts.local: npm run sass && concurrently -kr "grunt local" "npm run sentry"
scripts.local2: npm run sass && concurrently -kr "grunt local2" "npm run sentry"
scripts.local_admin: npm run adminless && concurrently -kr "grunt local_admin" "npm run adminsentry"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run commonbuild" "npm run loginbuild" "npm run lpbuild" "npm run insightsbuild" "npm run dantebuild" "npm run adminbuild" "npm run lp2build" && npm run wpbuild
scripts.sass: concurrently "npm run commonsass" "npm run loginsass" "npm run lpsass" "npm run insightssass" "npm run dantesass"
scripts.sentry: concurrently "npm run commonsentry" "npm run loginsentry" "npm run lpsentry" "npm run insightssentry" "npm run dantesentry"
scripts.wpdeva: concurrently "npm run wp-logindev" "npm run wp-lpdev" "npm run wp-insightsdev" "node bin/devsetup env=a"
scripts.wpdevb: concurrently "npm run wp-logindev" "npm run wp-lpdev" "node bin/devsetup env=b"
scripts.wpdevlocal: concurrently "npm run wp-logindev" "npm run wp-lpdev" "node bin/devsetup env=local"
scripts.wpqa: concurrently "npm run wp-logindev" "npm run wp-lpdev" "node bin/devsetup env=qa"
scripts.wpbuild: concurrently "npm run wp-loginbuild" "npm run wp-lpprod" "npm run wp-insightsbuild"
